data.eml:eml: A new species of Aculus mite (Acari: Eriophyidae), a potential biocontrol agent for Australian swamp stonecrop, Crassula helmsii (Crassulaceae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Knihinicki, Danuta K., Petanović, Radmila, Cvrković, Tatjana, Varia, Sonal (2018): A new species of Aculus mite (Acari: Eriophyidae), a potential biocontrol agent for Australian swamp stonecrop, Crassula helmsii (Crassulaceae). Zootaxa 4497 (4): 573-585, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4497.4.7
